basicstep - Static variable in class simple.simple
 
beginFrame() - Method in class jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GLDeferredRenderContext
This method is called at the beginning of each frame, i.e., before scene drawing starts.

This method is called at the beginning of each frame, i.e., before scene drawing starts.

This method is called at the beginning of each frame, i.e., before scene drawing starts.
beginFrame() - Method in class jrtr.swrenderer.SWRenderContext
Clear the framebuffer here.
beginRead() - Method in class jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.FrameBuffer
Basically the same as GLBuffer.beginRead(int).
beginRead(int) - Method in class jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GLBuffer
Begins reading from a texture from this FBO by binding ("activating") it.
beginWrite() - Method in class jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GLBuffer
Binds ("activate") this FBO, so any rendering calls will draw into this FBO.
bind() - Method in class jrtr.glrenderer.GLVertexArrayObject
Bind the VAO.
bindTexture(int, int, String, GLShader) - Method in class jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GLDeferredRenderContext
Activates a given texture unit, binds a texture to it, and assigns the texture unit to a specified texture in a shader.
